block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: I2C pins SCL : GPIO22 SDA : GPIO21
OLED initialize the OLED this is necessary
(0,0) (127,63) draw a line from top left corner to bottom right corner means draw a line from (0,0) to (127,63)
(64,32) 20 draw a filled circle at center (64,32) with radius of 20
(64,32) 30 draw a circle at center (64,32) with radius of 30
(16,8)=96=48 draw a rectangle with top left at (16,8) and width=96 and height=48
(24,16)=80=32 draw a filled rectangle with top left at (24,16) and width=80 and height=32
1 / / Note : there is 1 more parameter which is color of the lines drawn Options available are White / Black / Invert Default is White Invert means color use will be inverse of background color
3 (64,8)(44,56) (86,56) draw a filled triangle with 3 corner as (64,8), (44,56) and (86,56)
